text: Berndt Seite (born 22 April 1940) is a German politician. He was the 2nd minister president of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern from 1992 to 1998 and the 45th president of the German Bundesrat in 1992. Seite has been a member of the Christian Democratic Union since 1990.Dr Berndt Seite at Regierungsportal Mecklenburg-Vorpommern ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Berndt Seite
